log_in_with: Log in with your phone number or email.
weve_sent_an: We’ve sent an SMS with an activation code to your phone
name: Name
i_accept_the: I accept the terms and privacy policy
get_all_the: Get all the benefits and subscribe now!
you_can_cancel: You can cancel your subscription anytime
access_to_all: Access to all basic features of the platform
option_to_cancel: Option to cancel at any time
increased_visibility_for: Increased visibility for your business on the platform
marketing_opportunities: Marketing opportunities, such as the ability to run targeted ads or be featured in a newsletter
all_benefits_of: All benefits of the monthly subscription
discounted_pricing: Discounted pricing compared to the monthly plan
access_to: Access to additional features, such as advanced ability to add multiple photos and videos to your business listing
opportunity_to: Opportunity to be included in a rewards program, earning points or other benefits for staying on a subscription plan
increased_chances: Increased chances to be seen on the homepage or in specific categories
try_our_platform: Try our platform for a full month with no obligation and see for yourself how easy it is to promote your business. Enjoy all the basic features for free, then upgrade to our affordable subscription for even more benefits!
are_you_sure: Are you sure you want to cancel your subscription?
you_havent_added: You haven't added your business yet.
add_your_business_and: Add your business and let everyone find you!
enter_business: Enter a name of your business
choose_business: Choose a category of your business
enter_a_more: Enter a more specific category that represents a particular aspect of your business (e.g. Italian food, Massage, Moroccan Hammam spa)
enter_a_subcategory: Enter a subcategory of your business
enter_a_description: Enter a description of your business
enter_an_address: Enter an address of your business
add_a_phone: Add a phone number so your visitors can contact you
this_number_is: This number is available on WhatsApp
the_app_accepts: The app accepts images in various formats, such as JPEG, PNG, SVG, etc., with a max file size of 1 MB
expand_your: Expand Your Reach with Our Subscription
minimum_eight_characters:
Minimum eight characters,
 at least one uppercase letter,
 one lowercase letter,
 one number and one special character
